name: Coin Island (themis.williams)
description:
Can you collect the 21 coins of Coin Island in less than a minute?

Feel free to share your fastest times.

WASD / Arrow-keys to move.

E to read the sign-posts.

Spacebar to roll/sprint.

ESC for menu.

Mind your stamina-bar!

Credits:

Game by Themis Williams

Music by Cafofo

Sprites from Titan Souls by Acid Nerve
